yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>The River | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="A blowout double-album split evenly between huge house-party numbers (and a wealth of live staples) and darker, real-world tales in the vein of the title track, The River represented a Springsteen out to explore the emerging dualities of his music." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/the-river/" />

<meta property="og:title" content="The River" />
<meta property="og:description" content="A blowout double-album split evenly between huge house-party numbers (and a wealth of live staples) and darker, real-world tales in the vein of the title track, The River represented a Springsteen out to explore the emerging dualities of his music." />

yoast_head_json.title: The River | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: A blowout double-album split evenly between huge house-party numbers (and a wealth of live staples) and darker, real-world tales in the vein of the title track, The River represented a Springsteen out to explore the emerging dualities of his music.
yoast_head_json.og_description: A blowout double-album split evenly between huge house-party numbers (and a wealth of live staples) and darker, real-world tales in the vein of the title track, The River represented a Springsteen out to explore the emerging dualities of his music.
